Winter's Kiss.name: Winter's Kiss
Winter's Kiss.flavor: Snow flies and solidifies around your opponent, binding it in a frigid embrace.
Winter's Kiss.attack:
Your highest ability modifier + 6 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Your highest ability modifier + 9 vs. Fortitude
Winter's Kiss.onHit: 1d10 + your highest ability modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Winter's Kiss.aftereffect: The target takes 5 cold damage and is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Blizzard Blast.name: Blizzard Blast
Blizzard Blast.flavor: Snow and ice explodes from your fingertips to scatter your foes and bind them with ice.
Blizzard Blast.attack: Your highest ability modifier + 9 vs. Fortitude
Blizzard Blast.onHit: 3d6 + your highest ability modifier cold damage, and the target is blinded and immobilized (save ends both).
Blizzard Blast.onMiss: Half damage, and until the end of your turn the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and is slowed.
Blizzard Blast.effect: You teleport to any square within the blast.
